description:
Ash, Misty and Brock helped this Jigglypuff sing by improving its voice. Ever since, this Jigglypuff can appeared in numerous places attempting to find someone or a Pokémon which can listen to the whole of its song.
This Jigglypuff can be identified by the marker pen it carries which it used to draw on people or Pokémon who fall asleep while listening to its song.
name: Purin
